question: The function <katex>$f(x)=|cos~x|$</katex> is
choices: Everywhere continuous but not differentiable at odd multiples of <katex>$\frac{\pi}{2}$</katex>
explanation: Modulus function is continuous everywhere but not differentiable where the inner function is 0. <katex>$\cos x = 0$</katex> at odd multiples of <katex>$\pi/2$</katex>.
